comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Wife is Mary Baird Bryan. William Jennings Bryan's wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Jennings_Bryan

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: If the date on the photo is correct, this was taken about a week after he resigned as Secretary of State.

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Penny, we'll edit for full name, and add Mary. Thanks!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Photo was taken in New York City. The Bryans were en route to the Brooklyn Navy Yard, to witness the launch of the USS ARIZONA:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8103246810/in/photostream/]
